pages.text: Jewels can be recycled into $(l)small$() amounts of resources.$(br2)It may reward $(l)Gemstones$(), $(l)Silver Scrap$() or $(l)Wutodie Gems$().$(br2)Vault Tools $(l)can't$() be recycled.
Jewels are smelted in the Vault Recycler.$(br2)The main $(l)purpose$() of smelting Jewels is to craft $(l)new$() and $(l)improved$() ones.
